name: Emmanuel Rueda
headline: Business Intelligence & Analytics Leader

highlights: Developed BEATS reporting framework that boosted SLA compliance (80% → 98%) and accuracy (85% → 99%).
Designed and deployed executive Tableau and Looker Studio dashboards for Revenue, Sales, Finance, Marketing, Cybersecurity, and Fan Analytics.
Engineered scalable data workflows and ETL pipelines connecting Databricks, BigQuery, and on-prem systems.
Interactive maps with JavaScript (D3.js) for public data
Foresight & economic analysis for gov/energy clients

elevator_pitch: I’m a BI/Analytics leader with 5+ years building reliable data pipelines and executive dashboards (Databricks, BigQuery, SQL, Python, Tableau). I led Ticketmaster Mexico’s BI migration, automated ETL/ELT, and launched BEATS (80%→98% reporting effectiveness). Currently in Ontario (MBAI, Ontario Tech), I’m open to Co-op/Internships for Summer 2026 and full-time after that—ideally remote or Toronto-based.
